column1: Brother Larry Dalton will conduct services at 10:00am Wednesday
column2: June 24th at Woodlawn Life Celebration Centre at 311 Holiday Sq. Rd in Seymour. Visitation will be Tuesday at the funeral home from 3:00pm until 7:00pm and then on Wednesday from 9:00am until service time. Burial will follow services at Wesley Chapel Cemetery in Austin.
